# AI Unfiltered - Full Article List

> This file contains recent AI news articles for consumption by LLMs and AI agents.
> Updated every 4 hours. Links to original sources.


## 2026-01-31

### Spark: Strategic Policy-Aware Exploration via Dynamic Branching for Long-Horizon Agentic Learning
- Source: HF Daily Papers
- Category: open-source
- URL: https://tldr.takara.ai/p/2601.20209
- Summary: Reinforcement learning has empowered large language models to act as intelligent agents, yet training them for long-horizon tasks remains challenging due to the scarcity of high-quality trajectories, especially under limited resources. ### Automated HER2 scoring with uncertainty quantification using lensfree holography and deep learning
- Source: HF Daily Papers
- Category: open-source
